articles.content: When Apple last changed the iPhone's charging port, with 2012's iPhone 5, the move from the 30-pin connector that was first introduced on the iPod to the modern Lightning system was a radical shift. … [+7051 chars]

articles.author: Alan Martin
articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S24 packs a souped-up Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 — here's which phones could get it - Tom's Guide
articles.description: Rumor has it Samsung may be plotting a different chip strategy for its Galaxy S handsets
articles.content: At the end of July, the Samsung Galaxy S24 Plus popped up on Geekbench with an impressive set of scores. The listing includes a single-core score of 2,233 and a multi-core one of 6,661, making it spe… [+2296 chars]
